page.title: 03A Grandfather's Day
page.content: My name is Mr Forward and I work on Llanover Estate for Mr R. Herbert.I am the game keeper.I got up at 5.45.I came down stairs.I down the fires for the wife.I had a little bit of breakfast.I took my dogs for a run.When I come back I go on my rounds looking at all my traps to see if there was anything in there which there was not.I then went down to the lake to look at my cage traps to see if there was mink.There was I had one. then after that I went up and had a look at my hoppers which the birds feed on and in to see the duck on the lake and feed them.I came back home which was to be some where around 8.30 after I done that I had a bit of breakfast.I went to work in the woods doing what we call ditching that is cleaning ditches so that the rain water will not flood the woods.but
